name: Vacuum Platformer
description:
LudumDare40: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/vacuum-platformer

You play as an an anthropomorphic vacuum cleaner with the goal of sucking up everything in the level.

Unfortunately, the more you collect, the harder (or impossible) the level gets. Each level requires a bit of strategy and planning to suck everything up in order to complete it.
